results.title: CUET UG Result 2025 (OUT), On july 4 @cuet.nta.nic.in
results.brief: The Authority has announced the CUET UG Result 2025 on 04 July 2025. Candidates who are waiting for the CUET UG Scorecard 2025 can download their results using their Roll Number/Application Number and Date of Birth.
howToDownload: Visit the official website @cuet.nta.nic.in or use the direct link provided below.
Locate the CUET UG Result 2025 download link and click on it.
Enter your Roll Number/Application Number and Date of Birth.
Your CUET UG Result 2025 will be displayed on the screen.
Download or Print the Score Card for future reference.
